amendment.description: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for Border Security Fencing, Infrastructure, and Technology by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment offered by Mr. Poe (TX) to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $10 million and increase funds for Border Security Fencing, Infrastructure, and Technology by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
